16th February 2020

Confirmed COVID-19 Infection at P&T Office

We regret to inform that today the Department of Health notified that one of our staff on 35/F, Simon Ho of the Structural Engineering Department, was diagnosed to be infected with the COVID-19 virus. Simon did not go to China during CNY.

After Chinese New Year, Simon worked in the P&T Office between 30 January to 6th February 2020. If you worked in close proximity to Simon or had other close contact, for example group or face to face meetings or lunch, please inform your immediate supervisor urgently.
